name: on a tiny planet
description:
you are two faeries trapped on a tiny planet. you need pearls to escape!

work together to collect 25 magical pearls, before you run out of food!

use cards to clear fog, plant food, share energy, and more!

AT THE BEGINNING:

  • each player starts with 5 energy points
  • each player starts with a hand of 3 cards
  • together, you start with 9 units of food

DURING YOUR TURN:

  • arrow keys to move
  • you may move until you have no energy points remaining
  • while moving, you may pick up carrots or pearls
  • different types of terrain cost each player a different amount of energy

MOVEMENT COSTS:

Player 1 (Red)

  • empty grass: -2 energy points
  • flowers: -1 energy points
  • forest: -0 energy points

Player 2 (Blue)

  • empty grass: -0 energy points
  • flowers: -1 energy points
  • forest: -2 energy points

ENDING YOUR TURN:

  • to end your turn, play a card from your hand using number keys 1-3
  • some cards help you, some hurt you, and some do nothing

AT THE END OF EACH TURN:

  • you draw 1 card
  • you gain energy until you have 5 energy points
  • one new fog square appears on the planet, and all of the fogs relocate
  • any seeds turn to carrots
  • one unit of food is eaten
